蝔字的基本解释

蝔
jiē
古书上说的一种虫。

蝔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiē］
［《廣韻》古諧切，平皆，見。］
［《廣韻》户皆切，平皆，匣。］
虫名。

蝔字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝔； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1089第08
【唐韻】古諧切【集韻】居諧切，?音皆。【類篇】蟲名，猥狗也。淮南呼爲雨母。【廣韻】《淮南子》曰：蝔知雨至。蝔蟲大如筆管，長三寸，代謂之猥狗，知天雨，則於草木下藏其身。　又戸皆切，音諧。義同。

蝔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蝔字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm
Basic explanation of words
Worm
jiē
A kind of insect mentioned in ancient books.
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiē］
["Guangyun" ancient harmony cut, all in common, see. ]
["Guangyun" households are cut, flat are all, box. ]
Insect name.
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝔; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1089-08
[Tang Yun] Ancient Harmony Cut [Ji Yun] Habitat Harmony Cut, all sounds. 【Classes】Insect names, awkward dogs. Huainan is called the mother of rain. [Guang Yun] "Huainanzi" said: "Ai knows the rain." The beetle is as big as a pen tube and is three inches long. It is called a wretched dog on its behalf. Knowing the rain, it hides its body under the grass and trees.　It's all cut, and the sound is harmonic. The same meaning.

Name meaning
Nothing.
jiē
сущ. зоол. один из видов крупной певчей цикады (возможно то же, что 马蜩 Criptotympana pustulata)
